description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Construction Socam. The average
  contract duration was 3.18 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $3.5M. The longest
  contract was 5.83 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $9.4M.
